name: Defenders 2 - the Decent
description:
This is the start of the work with the second part of Defenders of Adacan (the Descent) which will be a point and click style adventure game .

You can find the first part (the Ascent) here

https://per-k-grok.itch.io/defenders-of-adacan

To start of the work we have as a stand alone game, what is planned to be a mini game in the larger game.  Whack the Melon Brother

This is a whack-the-mole type of game. Here you whack the Melon Brother. But you must not hit the Bird, the Lion or the Lady (which might ring a bell if you have played the first part of Defenders of Adacan). More information in the README file that comes with the game.

More stuff will be added here as the work progresses.
